page.title: 18RELIGION - NAPTON
page.content: There was an old legend about the church first being built on the village green. When the bricks were taken ready for building they were taken to the top of Butt Hill. People said that is where God wanted it to be built. When a baby was christened, people used to believe that the vicar was sending away the devil. There is a door by the font with a grille. This may have been put there so the devil could fly away. It is called the devil's door. There were a lot of graves in the churchyard. Some of the old graves were crumbling away and you could not read the dates. Most of the old graves were made in the 1600's, that is nearly 400 years ago.Sometimes people used to steal bodies out of graves to sell to doctors to do experiments on them, so they put railings round the graves.
